EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c}
Attached is the ENSI reference letter to support your TN Visa Application for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} workshop on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}.
Please make sure to bring the following with you when you make your application:
Proof of identity and Canadian citizenship
Letter from client
Reference from ENSI
Original academic credentials plus one copy
Copy of NAFTA approved professions list
Evidence of any your ties to Canada (such as dependent family members, real property or bank accounts, dependents)
Filing fee - $50 USD (approx)
Form I94 fee - $6 USD (approx)
I think that about covers it. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
Kind regards
